title: On Stage: Hoopcamp Goes Beyond Hula Hoops
teaser: In our "On Stage" series today, we go to Hoopcamp, which bills itself as the "largest yearly gathering of the hoop dance community."
contentencoded:
[Youtube]

On Friday we go “On Stage,” our look at what’s happening on the boards across the country.

Today we take a look at Hoopcamp, which bills itself as the “largest yearly gathering of the hoop dance community.” The hoops look like hula hoops but are a little different.

Hoopcamp takes place at a Tibetan spiritual center in the Santa Cruz mountains of California.

Here & Now’s Robin Young speaks with Heather Troy, who started Hoopcamp.
